document.full_text: as fast as you can translate n.b.a. lockout to italian, kobe bryant's fans jump to an easy conclusion: yes, one day he will be back.
document.title: in italy, holding out hope for bryant's return
lines_and_colors: as fast as you can translate n.b.a. lockout to italian, kobe bryant's fans jump to an easy conclusion: yes, one day he will be back.
